betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The furnace dimension is real, I knew it!
This world seems to be in some way connected to Terra. The wormhole to it opened in response to furnaces, and a whole lot of fuel.
As my other recent encounters with magic show, there seems to be many more emergent properties in the more 'conceptual' aspects of nature.
Magic in books, magic in meatballs, and I guess furnaces too. Well, magic is a good word for it, but there must be some fundamental physical laws behind these phenomena, I just have to figure them out!
Anyhow, the furnace world of Telos is a strange and beautiful place. Howlers call this place their home, and yet they seem to be capable of travelling between Telos and Terra in a seamless way.
I was able to enter the furnace world by forming a strong bond with the flint and furnace. Howlers possess this bond innately, thanks to their furnace hearts.
